title: Champion of Hestia
name: Majursa - Champion of Hestia
printed_effect:
When you Cast this Majursa you can target
and destroy cards up to the number
of {ursa} Elestrals on your field.
Your {ursa} Elestrals get +1 {attack} for each {fire}
Enchanting each Hestia on the field.
effect: When you Cast this Majursa you can target and destroy cards up to the number of {ursa} Elestrals on your field. Your {ursa} Elestrals get +1 {attack} for each {fire} Enchanting each Hestia on the field.
